    Stay in the heart of Berlin – Excellent location - show map

    You're eligible for a Genius discount at Meliá Berlin! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

    Offering an exclusive Executive club and spacious rooms, this stylish hotel stands beside the River Spree on Berlin’s Friedrichstraße shopping street. Free and unlimited high-speed WiFi is featured throughout the property.

    The bright rooms and suites at the non-smoking Meliá Berlin include a flat-screen TV, soundproofed windows, and a bathroom with heated floors.

    Spa facilities at the Meliá Berlin include a modern gym and sauna. Rental bicycles are provided on request.

    A rich buffet breakfast is offered each morning. Guests can also sample Mediterranean specialities and tapas in the bar.

    The Brandenburg Gate and many other famous sites are within 1 km of the Meliá Berlin. Friedrichstraße Train Station is just 100 m away, providing great underground, city rail, and tram links to all parts of Berlin.

    This is our guests' favourite part of Berlin, according to independent reviews.

    Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 9.6 for a two-person trip.

    Meliá Berlin has been welcoming Booking.com guests since 15 Jan 2010.
     Hotel chain/brand: Meliá Hotels & Resorts

    House rules

    Meliá Berlin takes special requests - add in the next step!

    Check-in

    15:00 From 15:00 hours

    Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in

    Check-out

    12:00 Until 12:00 hours

    Cancellation/
    prepayment

    Cancellation and prepayment policies vary according to accommodation type. Please enter the dates of your stay and check the conditions of your required room.

    Children and beds

    Child policies

    Children of any age are welcome.

    Children aged 12 years and above are considered adults at this property.

    To see correct prices and occupancy information, please add the number of children in your group and their ages to your search.

    Cot and extra bed policies

    Cots and extra beds are not available at this property.

    No age restriction

    There is no age requirement for check-in

    Pets

    Pets are allowed. Charges may be applicable.

    Cards accepted at this hotel

    Meliá Berlin accepts these cards and reserves the right to temporarily hold an amount prior to arrival.

    Meliá Berlin accepts these cards and reserves the right to temporarily hold an amount prior to arrival.

    The fine print

    Please note that extra beds are available on request only, and need to be confirmed by the hotel.

    Please also note that guests must provide the credit card used to make the reservation at check- in.

    When booking more than 9 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

    Please note that Dogs are not allowed in the restaurant outlets, assistance dogs are excluded from this rule.

    Please note that cats are not allowed; only dogs weighing up to 30 kilos are accepted.

    In response to Coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.

    Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

    How does it work?

    • 1

      It starts with a booking

      It starts with a booking

      The only way to leave a review is to first make a booking. That's how we know our reviews come from real guests who have stayed at the property.

    • 2

      Followed by a trip

      Followed by a trip

      When guests stay at the property they check out how quiet the room is, how friendly the staff are and more.

    • 3

      And finally, a review

      And finally, a review

      After their trip, guests tell us about their stay. We check for naughty words and verify the authenticity of all guest reviews before adding them to our site.
